name: Azuran Tales: Trials
description: Azuran Tales: Trials offers challenging combat, beautiful levels and merciless enemies to overcome. Journey across the World of Azuran as you discover its many environments, lore and history in a game that blends platformers with RPG elements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Quad-Core or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 630 /  AMD Radeon DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i7 / AMD Quad-Core or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 /  AMD Radeon DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
